properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key for JWT token generation and validation

properties.name: jwt.access-token.expiration
properties.description: Access token expiration time in milliseconds (180000 = 3 minutes for inactivity timeout)

properties.name: jwt.refresh-token.expiration
properties.description: Refresh token expiration time in milliseconds (604800000 = 7 days to renew session)
